授業目的: This course introduces students to current debates over the relation between religion and liberal democratic society.
到達目標: Students will gain knowledge of and insights into the complicated relation between religion and society according to liberal democratic principles.

トピック.授業計画1: Topics will be chosen to reflect student interests as well as current debates relating to religion and society around the world.
トピック.授業外学習2: Weekly readings, essay topics, and presentation prompts will be announced in class.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: 授業外学修課題／Assignment, homework required outside class (06)
成績評価Grading2: プレゼンテーション・発表／Presentation (07)
成績評価Grading3: 授業への参加度（自発性、積極性、主体性、等）／In-class participation,contribution (09)
